module.name: assembly_physical_interface_requirement
module.keywords: module, assembly interface detailed design, critical component placement, mating connector, fit, design volume

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of the information needed to describe the manner by which an electronic assembly shall mechanically interface to the next higher assembly. The type of mating connector and its location relative to the electronic assembly are provided as a design requirement, that must be satisfied in the design.

inscope.li: items within the scope of application module Assembly functional interface requirement, ISO/CD-TS 10303-1635;
items within the scope of application module Advanced boundary representation, ISO/TS 10303-1514;
items within the scope of application module Curve swept solid, ISO/CD-TS 10303-1659;
items within the scope of application module Geometrically bounded surface, ISO/TS 10303-1507;
items within the scope of application module Physical unit 3d shape, ISO/CD-TS 10303-1727;
items within the scope of application module Product view definition, ISO/TS 10303-1019.
